bwwExcerpt: Who would have thought that one of the highlights of the summer would be watching Les Dennis fondle Michael Ball? No wonder that the old stagers, playing Wilbur and Edna Turnblad in Hairspray, looked close to corpsing during their vaudeville-style celebration of marital bliss on (You're) Timeless to Me. They were having enormous fun, and so was the socially distanced audience. Ball's impromptu speech at the end of a vivacious opening night was a reminder of how much actors have missed the thrill
